gem.apotheotic_additions:alchemy/wildhea: Breaking Lapis Lazuli Ore has a %s%% chance to drop Ambrosium Shards instead.
effect.voidscape.aura.desc: Surrounds you in a void aura that damages creatures nearby.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:heirlo: Aquire an Heirloom Quality gem; this can only be an Apotheotic Additions Jewel.
gem.apotheotic_additions:alchemy/rat_che: Breaking Lead Ore has a %s%% chance to drop Cheese instead.
gem.apotheotic_additions:alchemy/midas.a: Breaking Leaves to obtain Saplings has a %s%% chance to instead transform it into a Golden Apple.
gem.apotheotic_additions:alchemy/heartla: Breaking Dirt has a %s%% chance transform it into Rich Soil.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:heirlo: Obtain an Heirloom affix item, containing one very strong affix.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:simple: Obtain a Simple Reforging Table, capable of reforging gear up to Rare quality.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:infuse: Obtain an Infused Coin, capable of trading with villagers for rare loot.
effect.botania.allure.desc: Catch fishing loot and treasure twice as fast.
gem.apotheotic_additions:alchemy/heartla: Breaking Logs has a %s%% chance to instead scrape off Tree Bark.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:ascend: Obtain an Ascended Coin, capable of trading with villagers for very rare loot.
effect.farmersdelight.comfort.desc: Allows you to maintain natural regeneration, even if hungry
effect.cataclysm.blessing_of_amethyst.de: Grants immunity to Darkness, Abyssal Burn, and Abyssal Fear.

advancements.apotheotic_additions:reforg: Obtain a Reforging Table, capable of reforging gear up to Mythic quality.
alexsmobs.potion.soulsteal.desc: Heals you for an amount equal to how much damage you deal.
advancements.apotheotic_additions:artifa: Aquire an Artifact Quality gem; this can only be an Apotheotic Additions Jewel.
effect.farmersdelight.nourishment.desc: Prevents loss of hunger through exhausting actions
effect.immersiveengineering.flammable.de: Increases fire damage taken from fire damage over time.
effect.aether.inebriation.desc: Deals light damage, and causes you to randomly move.
effect.botania.bloodthirst.desc: Natural mob spawns around you ignore lighting and other conditions.

effect.undergarden.virulence.desc: Deals medium nonlethal damage, and turns your hearts purple.

effect.botania.soul_cross.desc: Heals you when you kill something
advancements.apotheotic_additions:artifa: Find an Artifact affix item, containing very high stat boosts.

effect.born_in_chaos_v1.infernal_flame.d: Causes Fire damage that cannot be removed by water.

effect.born_in_chaos_v1.rotten_smell.des: Summons hostile Corpse Flies at random intervals.
